entry.title: Mysql Galera Cluster
entry.content:
#Mysql Galera Cluster

##准备环境
修改主机名、网卡修改及hosts文件
/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts
/etc/hosts
192.168.3.101 db1
192.168.3.102 db2
192.168.3.103 db3

/etc/init.d/iptables stop
chkconfig iptables off
setenforce 0

##Add MariaDB Repositories
vi /etc/yum.repos.d/mariadb.repo
[mariadb]
name = MariaDB
baseurl = http://yum.mariadb.org/10.0/centos6-amd64
gpgkey=https://yum.mariadb.org/RPM-GPG-KEY-MariaDB
gpgcheck=1

##Install MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 software

sudo yum install http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/socat-1.7.2.3-1.el6.x86_64.rpm -y

sudo yum install MariaDB-Galera-server MariaDB-client rsync galera -y

##Setup MariaDB security
sudo service mysql start
sudo /usr/bin/mysql_secure_installation

##Create MariaDB Galera Cluster users （都操作）
mysql -u root -p
mysql> DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE user=’’;
mysql> GRANT ALL ON . TO ‘root’@’%’ IDENTIFIED BY ‘123456’;
mysql> GRANT USAGE ON . to sst_user@’%’ IDENTIFIED BY ‘123456’;
mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES on . to sst_user@’%’;
mysql> FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
mysql> quit

##Create the MariaDB Galera Cluster config
三台机器全部停止
service mysql stop

###db1 conf
cat >> /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf << EOF
binlog_format=ROW
default-storage-engine=innodb
innodb_autoinc_lock_mode=2
innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog=1
query_cache_size=0
query_cache_type=0
bind-address=0.0.0.0
datadir=/var/lib/mysql
innodb_log_file_size=100M
innodb_file_per_table
innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=2
wsrep_provider=/usr/lib64/galera/libgalera_smm.so
wsrep_cluster_address=”gcomm://192.168.3.101,192.168.3.102,192.168.3.103”
wsrep_cluster_name=’galera_cluster’
wsrep_node_address=’192.168.3.101’
wsrep_node_name=’db1’
wsrep_sst_method=rsync
wsrep_sst_auth=sst_user:123456
EOF

###db2 conf
cat >> /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf << EOF
binlog_format=ROW
default-storage-engine=innodb
innodb_autoinc_lock_mode=2
innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog=1
query_cache_size=0
query_cache_type=0
bind-address=0.0.0.0
datadir=/var/lib/mysql
innodb_log_file_size=100M
innodb_file_per_table
innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=2
wsrep_provider=/usr/lib64/galera/libgalera_smm.so
wsrep_cluster_address=”gcomm://192.168.3.101,192.168.3.102,192.168.3.103”
wsrep_cluster_name=’galera_cluster’
wsrep_node_address=’192.168.3.102’
wsrep_node_name=’db2’
wsrep_sst_method=rsync
wsrep_sst_auth=sst_user:123456
EOF

###db3 conf
cat >> /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf << EOF
binlog_format=ROW
default-storage-engine=innodb
innodb_autoinc_lock_mode=2
innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog=1
query_cache_size=0
query_cache_type=0
bind-address=0.0.0.0
datadir=/var/lib/mysql
innodb_log_file_size=100M
innodb_file_per_table
innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=2
wsrep_provider=/usr/lib64/galera/libgalera_smm.so
wsrep_cluster_address=”gcomm://192.168.3.101,192.168.3.102,192.168.3.103”
wsrep_cluster_name=’galera_cluster’
wsrep_node_address=’192.168.3.103’
wsrep_node_name=’db3’
wsrep_sst_method=rsync
wsrep_sst_auth=sst_user:123456
EOF

##Initialize the first cluster node
在db1 执行集群初始化
/etc/init.d/mysql start –wsrep-new-cluster

在db1查询状态
[root@db1 ~]# mysql -uroot -p -e”show status like ‘wsrep%’”
Enter password:
+——————————+———————————————+
| Variable_name | Value |
+——————————+———————————————+
| wsrep_local_state_uuid | b0b9fad8-f18d-11e5-b824-d79ecea7938f |
| wsrep_protocol_version | 7 |
| wsrep_last_committed | 0 |
| wsrep_replicated | 0 |
| wsrep_replicated_bytes | 0 |
| wsrep_repl_keys | 0 |
| wsrep_repl_keys_bytes | 0 |
| wsrep_repl_data_bytes | 0 |
| wsrep_repl_other_bytes | 0 |
| wsrep_received | 2 |
| wsrep_received_bytes | 140 |
| wsrep_local_commits | 0 |
| wsrep_local_cert_failures | 0 |
| wsrep_local_replays | 0 |
| wsrep_local_send_queue | 0 |
| wsrep_local_send_queue_max | 1 |
| wsrep_local_send_queue_min | 0 |
| wsrep_local_send_queue_avg | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_local_recv_queue | 0 |
| wsrep_local_recv_queue_max | 2 |
| wsrep_local_recv_queue_min | 0 |
| wsrep_local_recv_queue_avg | 0.500000 |
| wsrep_local_cached_downto | 18446744073709551615 |
| wsrep_flow_control_paused_ns | 0 |
| wsrep_flow_control_paused | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_flow_control_sent | 0 |
| wsrep_flow_control_recv | 0 |
| wsrep_cert_deps_distance | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_apply_oooe | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_apply_oool | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_apply_window | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_commit_oooe | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_commit_oool | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_commit_window | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_local_state | 4 |
| wsrep_local_state_comment | Synced | #<– cluster is synced
| wsrep_cert_index_size | 0 |
| wsrep_causal_reads | 0 |
| wsrep_cert_interval | 0.000000 |
| wsrep_incoming_addresses | 192.168.3.101:3306 | #<– node db1 is a provider
| wsrep_evs_delayed | |
| wsrep_evs_evict_list | |
| wsrep_evs_repl_latency | 2.549e-06/5.872e-06/1.194e-05/3.25918e-06/5 |
| wsrep_evs_state | OPERATIONAL |
| wsrep_gcomm_uuid | b0b939c9-f18d-11e5-863d-eb311fcdd7c1 |
| wsrep_cluster_conf_id | 1 |
| wsrep_cluster_size | 1 | #<– cluster consists of 1 node
| wsrep_cluster_state_uuid | b0b9fad8-f18d-11e5-b824-d79ecea7938f |
| wsrep_cluster_status | Primary |
| wsrep_connected | ON |
| wsrep_local_bf_aborts | 0 |
| wsrep_local_index | 0 |
| wsrep_provider_name | Galera |
| wsrep_provider_vendor | Codership Oy info@codership.com |
| wsrep_provider_version | 25.3.14(r3560) |
| wsrep_ready | ON | #<– good :)
| wsrep_thread_count | 2 |
+——————————+———————————————+
[root@db1 ~]#

##Add the other cluster nodes

db2执行
service mysql start
查询
[root@db2 ~]# mysql -uroot -p -e”show status like ‘wsrep%’”
Enter password:
会看到如下结果
| wsrep_local_state_comment | Synced |
| wsrep_incoming_addre sses | 192.168.3.102:3306,192.168.3.101:3306 |
| wsrep_cluster_size | 2 |
| wsrep_connected | ON |
| wsrep_ready | ON |

db3执行
[root@db3 ~]# service mysql start
Starting MySQL..SST in progress, setting sleep higher. SUCCESS!
[root@db3 ~]# mysql -uroot -p -e”show status like ‘wsrep%’”
Enter password:
| wsrep_local_state_comment | Synced |
| wsrep_incoming_addre sses | 192.168.3.102:3306,192.168.3.103:3306,192.168.3.101:3306 |
| wsrep_cluster_size | 3 |
| wsrep_connected | ON |
| wsrep_ready | ON |

##Verify replication

on db1:
mysql -u root -p -e ‘CREATE DATABASE clustertest;’
mysql -u root -p -e ‘CREATE TABLE clustertest.mycluster ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(50), ipaddress VARCHAR(20), PRIMARY KEY(id));’
mysql -u root -p -e ‘INSERT INTO clustertest.mycluster (name, ipaddress) VALUES (“db1”, “192.168.3.101”);’

Check if the database, table and data exists:
[root@db1 ~]# mysql -u root -p -e ‘SELECT * FROM clustertest.mycluster;’
Enter password:
+—-+——+—————+
| id | name | ipaddress |
+—-+——+—————+
| 3 | db1 | 192.168.3.101 |
+—-+——+—————+

检查节点db2
[root@db2 ~]# mysql -u root -p -e ‘SELECT * FROM clustertest.mycluster;’
Enter password:
+—-+——+—————+
| id | name | ipaddress |
+—-+——+—————+
| 3 | db1 | 192.168.3.101 |
+—-+——+—————+

检查节点db3
[root@db3 ~]# mysql -u root -p -e ‘SELECT * FROM clustertest.mycluster;’
Enter password:
+—-+——+—————+
| id | name | ipaddress |
+—-+——+—————+
| 3 | db1 | 192.168.3.101 |
+—-+——+—————+

可以确定复制成功；

##常用命令

show status like ‘wsrep%’;
entry.summary:
#Mysql Galera Cluster

##准备环境
修改主机名、网卡修改及hosts文件
/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts
/etc/hosts
192.168.3.101 db1
